definition: to score a victory/to prevail over one's opponents

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)
favorite (to win a race or championship)/well-placed contestant
outsider (i.e. not expected to win a race or championship)
pinyin: wu2 qu3 sheng4 xi1 wang4 zhe3

sentences.english: With the iron fist against the puma vocalist, failed to win.
sentences.chinese: 鐵彪用殘拳對付紫麟，卻未能取勝。

sentences.english: Every team has their own strategy to win.
sentences.chinese: 每支隊伍都有自己的取勝之道。

sentences.english: When a war is unwinnable, why fight?
sentences.chinese: 當一場戰爭不可取勝，爲何要去戰鬥？

sentences.english: A would-be defeated troops will engage his enemy first before looking for chances of victory.
sentences.chinese: 打敗戰的軍隊先同敵人交戰，而後希望僥倖取勝。

sentences.english: We have a chance because we are at home.
sentences.chinese: 下一輪我們主場作戰，是有機會取勝的。

sentences.english: We hoped that justice would prevail.
Front-court depth and perimeter defense are the keys to the Lakers' victory.
sentences.chinese: 前場的深度和外線的防守將是湖人取勝的關鍵。

sentences.english: This delay facilitated the Spanish victory in the Battle of Bailen in July.
sentences.chinese: 這耽擱有助西班牙軍隊在七月的拜倫戰役中取勝。

sentences.english: I am sorry for friends of Catania but we have to absolutely win .
sentences.chinese: 我對卡塔尼亞的朋友們感到抱歉，因爲我們必須取勝。

sentences.english: His horse won by a nose.
sentences.chinese: 他的馬以一鼻之差取勝。

sentences.english: Mr. Trump won three crucial Midwestern states by very small margins.
sentences.chinese: 特朗普以非常小的優勢在中西部三個關鍵州取勝。

sentences.english: And then I will give you some doohickeys that succeed with your image.
sentences.chinese: 下面我給大家介紹一些以形象取勝的小竅門。

sentences.english: Skunked: Won a game of Invasion in the 1st phase.
sentences.chinese: 配對清單的入侵遊戲，在第一階段即取勝。

sentences.english: It will more effectively implement the strategy of diversifying market and expanding trade on the strength of quality and through science and technology.
sentences.chinese: 更好的實施市場多元化，以質取勝和科技興貿戰略。

sentences.english: High card is the lowest possible winning hand combination.
sentences.chinese: 憑高牌取勝是在所有贏手裏可能性最小的。

sentences.english: Only carry hand-built and automatically winding mechanical watch movement can win.
sentences.chinese: 只有攜帶手工打造並自動上鍊機械手錶機芯能取勝。
